metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15888 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
Lua through 5.4.0 mishandles the interaction between stack resizes and garbage collection, leading to a heap-based buffer overflow, heap-based buffer over-read, or use-after-free.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-15888` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblua5.4-0 - 5.4.1-1
lua5.4 - 5.4.1-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> couldn't reproduce on lua earlier than 5.4. No indication that earlier versions are vulnerable. Marking not-affected.

criterions.comment: lua5.4 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.1-1').
